200 DIN hp 2.0 litre boxer engine
Rear wheel drive
TORSEN Limited slip differential

mdata.expanded:
200 DIN hp 2.0 litre boxer engine
Rear wheel drive
TORSEN Limited slip differential
Vehicle stability control (VSC with 3 driving modes)
Traction control
17" lightweight alloy wheels
Dual zone auto control air conditioning
Sports seats
Toyota Touch Multimedia system with Bluetooth and MP3 connectivity
Smart keyless start
Analogue and digital meters
Leather steering wheel, parking brake and gear stick
mdata.xhtml:
Main features (Additional to Icon grade features)
17" graphite alloy wheels
High Intensity Discharge (HID) headlights
LED daytime running lights
Nakama black seat trim with leather bolsters
Smart Start & Entry System

mdata.expanded: Black heated leather & Alcantara seats are available as an option on the GT86, adding extra style and comfort to your car.

derivatives.description: 2.0 Boxer Automatic Leather Touch and Go

mdata.expanded: Black heated leather & Alcantara seats are available as an option on the GT86, adding extra style and comfort to your car.

Upgrade to the optional Toyota Touch & Go to be even more connected. Toyota Touch and Go adds full map satellite navigation, connected services and text messaging functionality to the standard Toyota Touch Multimedia System.
